DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety effectiveness Percutaneous Transluminal Angioplasty ( PTA ) use Drug-Coated Balloons treatment Superficial Femoral popliteal peripheral Artery disease .
DOC.brief_title: Randomized Comparison DCB Treatment Superficial Femoral Popliteal Peripheral Artery Disease
DOC.criteria: Age 19 Subject claudication critical limb ischemia ( Rutherford classification level 2~5 ) Subject total occlusion stenosis ≥70 % ( de novo , restenosis ) Vessel diameter 4~6mm Acute stage Acute thrombosis target limb target vessel Failure guide wire pas Distal outflow Lesion poor inflow Life expectancy ≤ 2 year Allergic paclitaxel Last stage renal failure dialysis Previous treatment atherectomy , laser , cryoplasty , scoring , cut , balloon angioplasty Pregnant breast feed woman disagree contraception
